node.title: Piercisms Generator
node.doctext: [% my @wit = ( "I was only pretending to be your friend,", "I'm a little bit country, you're a little bit", "Everything's coming up", "Have a nice steaming cup of", "I will sex you wild,", "Poop poop poop", "Your mother was right all along,", "Kiss my grits,", "I love you my wittle", "Some girls are bigger than", "I've got a pocket-full of", "Boochy-kookie-sooble-doo, ", "I promise not to kill you,", "Gooooooood morning", "Yer a naughty lil'", "Yer-a-sweet-smackin-sexy", "Mama's got a brand new bag o'", ); "".$wit[int(rand(@wit))].""; %] [% #return; #remove this line my @wit = ( "[I give myself|Nipple]", "[The View From My Room|Croony]", "[Dr. Brightman|Swoon]", "[Because I dig you|Ninny]", "[I break myself down|Pleasant]", "[Tell me a story about trains.|Joy]", "[Tell me why you're an idiot|Pickle]", "[I was once stranded on a desert island|Poodle]", "[nodes i like|Poop]", "[drowning in time|Woogums]", "[deconstructing datagirl|Silly]", "[nodes that may make you feel better|Honey]", "[suicide is painless|Muffin]", "[How do men touch you?|Woogle]", "[things to do to salvage a shitty day|Snargle]", "[yay!|Wiggly]", "[one is the loneliest number|Cuddle]", "[my heart feels filled with warm water when I think of these things|Schnooker]", "[Only Slightly a Geek Girl|Cruller]", "[Why I should be the female voice of slashdot|Mutton]", "[January 24, 2000|Snifter]", "[the funniest thing i've seen today|Goober]", "[I give myself|Snapple]", "[life after god|Bunny]", "[Tierlon|Foggy]", "[Spare Key Savior|Wiggly]", "[Copper Starlight|Mister]", "[Yay for pie!|Sookie]", "[wandering the toronto eaton center|Smackle]", "[my first kiss|Ripply]", "[ownership kiss|Moogie]", ); "".$wit[int(rand(@wit))].""; %][% return; #remove this line my @wit = ( "[our new friend, the ten-foot pole|maggot!]", "[I Fell Off The Ferris Wheel and Now I Am Paralyzed And Bitter|lump!]", "[Our Last Conversation|mousey!]", "[Her, eating apples|Oostendork!]", "[Total Depravity|pants!]", "[2:06|pooper!]", "[little anarchy panties|woogums!]", "[the 26 stages of corpse deterioration|facey!]", "[shore leave|headkins!]", "[I would like to make love to jessicapierce|trousers!]", "[nathan, this is unacceptable|mumpus!]", "[everything2 civil war|bottoms!]", "[letters from a savior; offer for a few|mookums!]", "[The sisters of mercy|smacker!]", "[who by fire?|ducky!]", "[An Irony Of Chain|slapper!]", "[Dr. Bernice|head!]", "[pictures of everythingians|chops!]", "[Shopping for groceries|cracker!]", "[kids aren't cute; they just do stupid things|cakienoggin!]", "[winter bath|miggelmopper!]", "[american music|wonderwiggle!]", "[county lines|lambiekins!]", "[song for leaving|tinywiggles!]", "[feed your head|fuzzylickins!]", "[tectonic|whiskers!]", "[friends|cakes!]", "[a murder in memphis|poker!]", "[mythos|smackerbasser!]", "[center park|spoodletipper!]", "[mr. seward|ladderblather!]", "[I Fell Off The Ferris Wheel and Now I Am Paralyzed And Bitter|whoopielicker!]", ); $wit[int(rand(@wit))]; %]
